item.description:
Come join Abeille this week for a store-wide sale including:

30%-60% off Rubber stamps, inks, stickler, card stock, topic markers and more

20%-50% off selected bead strands, semi-precious, leather, chain and more

20%-50%+ off selected jewelry, gift items, iced-tea brewing systems, vintage brooches

Sale is all week.

 

On Saturday, enter to win a raffle for a free class.

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: Abeille Sale - today - Sunday, Sept 18 including Sidewalk Sale on Sat, Sept 17
